column4: Hello ! I have a laptop and ubuntu don't start in SATA AHCI mode ( in BIOS ). I push SATA ide ( In BIOS ) and Start Well done, but I Push Sata AHCI Don't start... Can you help me ?
it looks like you are saying that ubuntu both starts and don starts using AHCI, can you reprhase your question?

my laptop it's new. The bios has two modes... SATA AHCI ( Fast access hard disk ) IDE Mode ( Normal ), When I push SATA AHCI Ubuntu crash in the start... When I push ide mode, start well. Can you help me ?
i'm afraid not, I was just wondering what your exact issue was.
